entry.title: Introduction
entry.content:
Greetings! 👋🏻 Welcome to my homepage.

About me

I am currently a research assistant (preparing for doctoral thesis work) at Department of Chemical and Metallurgical Engineering, School of Chemical Engineering, Aalto University, where I am supervised by Prof. Yongdan Li. Before that, I received the M.Eng. degree in Chemical Engineering from Xiamen University in 2021.

My research focuses on Biomass utilization, especially the conversion of lignin into chemicals with high economic value. Industrial catalysis, including photocatalysis, electrocatalysis and thermal catalysis. Theoretical simulation, density functional theory and molecular dynamics simulation..

News

Educations

  • Aalto University
    research assistant in Chemical Engineering.

  • Xiamen University
    M.S. in Chemical Engineering, from August 2018 to June 2021.

  • Southwest Petroleum University
    B.S. in Chemical Engineering, from August 2014 to June 2018.

Selected Publications

  • Carbon quantum dots functionalized g-C3N4 nanosheets as enhanced visible-light photocatalysts for water splitting

Gen Li, Jiaming Huang, Niuniu Wang, Jiale Huang, Yanmei Zheng, Guowu Zhan, Qingbiao Li. Diamond and Related Materials, 2021
https://doi.org/10.1016/j.diamond.2021.108242.

  • Insight into the dynamic adsorption behavior of graphene oxide multichannel architecture toward contaminants
    Jian Tian, Gen Li, Wang He, Kok Bing Tan, Daohua Sun, Junfu Wei, Qingbiao Li. Chinese Journal of Chemical Engineering, 2023
    https://doi.org/10.1016/j.cjche.2021.12.029.

  • The synergistic effect of potassium ions and nitrogen defects on carbon nitride for enhanced photocatalytic hydrogen evolution
    Ziyun You, Gen Li, Chuanhu Wang, Qingbiao Li, Yanmei Zheng. International Journal of Hydrogen Energy, 2023
    https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ijhydene.2023.01.089.

Patents

  • An experimental device for measuring rate constants of H2O2 decomposition reaction
    Ying Liu, Gen Li. ZL208766072U

    Xiamen University 2018-2021

    Southwest Petroleum University.2017
